p: Additionally, and despite a detailed cost analysis was not performed, the costs of monitoring the flowering in the field versus the costs of just deploying the UAV and processing the image were clearly different: flower monitoring at each field site (which sampled some plots and not the entire area overflow by the UAV) required four researchers to work for about 8 h while each UAV flight was done in less than 2 h with 2 operators (at some locations 1).
